title: The Night of the Mary Kay Commandos Featuring Smell O-Toons
description: Here again for the masses of adoring Bloom County fans is a collectionof the best daily and Sunday strips from the past year. Features the bonus, peel-away insert, Smell-O-Toons, the aromatic fragrance that is dabbed on more Commando pulse points than all other perfumes combined! Little, Brown.
author: Berkeley Breathed
